_metadata.description: PRD Control Tower requirement registry - Parent-level requirements reference child modules declared under imports

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Catalog view listing all scenarios/resources with PRD status
requirements.title: Catalog view with comprehensive PRD status indicators
requirements.description: Tracks the complete experience for browsing all scenarios/resources with accurate status badges (Has PRD, Draft pending, Violations, Missing). Child implementation requirements cover enumeration, filtering, and status display.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Draft lifecycle (create, edit, save, delete, publish)
requirements.title: Complete draft lifecycle management
requirements.description: Tracks draft CRUD operations with atomic file persistence, database synchronization, and publishing workflow. Child implementation requirements cover API endpoints and UI components.

requirements.title: Idea backlog with freeform text intake and conversion
requirements.description: Captures backlog intake workflows where users paste freeform notes and convert them to drafts or save to backlog for later triage.

requirements.title: Requirements registry parsing and operational target linkage
requirements.description: Validates that modular requirements/ folders are ingested correctly, operational targets are extracted from PRD checklists, and linkage is surfaced in the draft workspace.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > AI-assisted section generation via resource-openrouter
requirements.title: AI-powered PRD content generation
requirements.description: Enables AI-assisted section generation and rewriting via resource-openrouter integration with context-aware prompts.

requirements.prd_ref: Functional Requirements > Must Have > Integration with scenario-auditor for PRD structure validation
requirements.title: PRD structure validation via scenario-auditor
requirements.description: Integrates with scenario-auditor to validate PRD structure compliance and surface violations with actionable feedback.

validation.notes: TestRunScenarioAuditor, TestCallAuditorAPI, TestHandleValidatePRD validate auditor integration
